div.p: Apple's Internet Services Organization is seeking a Security Engineer focused on building solutions to secure web sites, services, and data centers.This is a technical, hands-on role in a dynamic and fast paced environment. The candidate will need a good mixture of software engineering know-how, risk assessment methodology, and security engineering practices and tooling.

ul.li: Passionate about securing Apple’s products & customers
Expert familiarity with multiple programming languages and secure coding practices
Able to discuss risk assessments with audiences of various technical & business backgrounds
Experience integrating security practices into product focused engineering teams
Ability to identify gaps in security focused tooling & lead a peer group through project planning, scheduling, and execution

div.p: You will: Engineer solutions to secure Apple's internet services including: iCloud, iTunes, Maps, Siri, & others Build and improve critical security infrastructure services including: authentication, detection & response, web application security, data center security, operations security Develop fixes to complex vulnerabilities Work with engineers to threat model new projects and design responsive controls to ensure end-to-end customer protection Lead cutting-edge security efforts at a scale you’ll only be able to find at Apple Work cross-functionally with teams throughout Apple in all phases of the secure development lifecycle of products and services
Bachelors in Computer Science or Engineering or equivalent experience
